sentences.sentence: A fairly stripped-down and compressed kernel can easily fit into that kind of space, and Linux boot loaders have a lot of experience in building tiny decompressors to extract compressed kernels.
sentences.translation: 精简并压缩过的内核可以很容易地放入这种空间中，Linux引导加载程序在构建小型的解压程序来展开压缩内核方面有着非常丰富的经验。
